name: Osset
description:
Osset documentation can be found here:

https://osset.fandom.com/wiki/Osset_Wiki (still in construction)

Sneak peeks here:

https://twitter.com/OC_industrie

The controls are very simple, you use (W, A, S, D)

on your keyboard to move, or you can turn on the

mobile controls if you have a touch screen or something..

stuff can be changed in the newer version of the game.

changelogs:

V0.4 The light update

added new light system

fixed some file size issue, again..

added ingame options

added low detail mode

added tapes

added blackout

V0.3 The button update

added new part of the main map

added sound for flashlight

some small file size optimisation

HTML support not working for now, may try to fix it for 0.4 or 0.5

V0.2 The android update

removed ending / boom sound

added android support, you can now play on mobile

V0.1 The first concept

main idea of the game + mobile controls.
